common_settings.title: Create Common Settings
common_settings.description:
These settings apply to all heating zones.

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: You must create common settings first before adding any heating zones. Common settings include the boiler main switch, hysteresis value, and other global parameters that all zones will use.

data_description.boiler_main: Shared main boiler switch (same for all zones)
data_description.outdoor_temp_sensor: Outdoor temperature sensor - required for adaptive hysteresis (optional)
data_description.hysteresis: Base switching hysteresis - prevents frequent cycling (radiators only)
data_description.overheat_temp: If zone temperature reaches this value, heating shuts down immediately (safety)
data_description.adaptive_hysteresis_enabled: If enabled, hysteresis automatically increases in colder weather (more stable heating)

zone.title: Create New Heating Zone
zone.description: Define your new heating zone parameters.

data_description.title: Unique name for the heating zone (e.g. Ground Floor, Upstairs)
data_description.heating_mode: Select heating mode based on your zone type
data_description.thermostat_type: Wall thermostat (accurate measurement) or radiator thermostat (measures higher temperature)
data_description.temp_offset: Temperature compensation for radiator thermostats - added to target temperature (default: 3¬∞C)
data_description.sensor_entity_id: Temperature sensor entity for this zone
data_description.door_sensors: Door/window sensors - pause heating when open (optional)
